abstract: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration announced an investigation into complaints about “sharp reductions” in power on Ford F-150 trucks equipped with the 3.5-liter EcoBoost V-6 engine.
snippet: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration announced an investigation into complaints about “sharp reductions” in power on Ford F-150 trucks equipped with the 3.5-liter EcoBoost V-6 engine.
lead_paragraph: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Sunday that it was investigating consumer complaints about “sharp reductions” in acceleration on 2011 to 2013 Ford F-150 pickups that are equipped with the 3.5-liter EcoBoost V-6 engine.

headline.main: Safety Agency to Investigate Ford Pickup Engine Trouble
headline.print_headline: Safety Agency To Investigate Ford Pickup Engine Trouble
